Text: What soundtrack does this version have?

I guess the soundtrack is whatever you happen to be listening to at the time you watch this. It was made in 1922. A time period in which silent movies were about it. You should really do some research before posting stupid comments.

Hey Schmitty,  follow your own advice and do some research.  Every silent film has a musical soundtrack.  This particular film has several different ones.  Papaloupis asked an itelligent question.  Looks like you're the one who posted a stupid comment.
